item.description:
Bar Lola is known for its sangria (they have other drinks too of course!) and its great tapas. They are located on the ground level of the old Vendome building at the corner of Commonwealth and Dartmouth.

Join us for Thursday for a fun evening enjoying great drinks and food and relaxing with fun and interesting people. Everyone pays for their own food/drinks. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will be carrying a large red purse.
item.name: Tapas, Sangria and Fun Time as Bar Lola, Boston
